title: Top Places to visit in North Tripura, Dharmanagar, Tripura
content:
North Tripura is an administrative district in the state of Tripura in India. The district headquarters are located at Dharmanagar. The district occupies an area of 1422.19 km² and has a population of 693,947 (as of 2011).
Dharmanagar is a town with a Municipal Council in the North E

title: Top Places to visit in Sepahijala, Bishramganj, Tripura
content: Sepahijala District is a district of Tripura, India. This district was created in January 2012 when four new districts were established in Tripura, taking the number of districts in the state from four to eight. Part of the district was formed from the former district of West Tripura. The princip

title: Top Places to visit in South Tripura, Belonia, Tripura
content:
South Tripura is an administrative district in the state of Tripura in northeastern India.
Belonia is a town and Municipal Council in South Tripura district, Tripura, India. It is also the headquarters of South Tripura District. It is linked with Agartala (the state capital) by National H

title: Top Places to visit in Unokoti, Kailashahar, Tripura
Top Places to visit in West Tripura, Agartala, Tripura
content:
West Tripura is an administrative district in the state of Tripura in India. The district headquarters are located at Agartala. As of 2012 it is the most populous district of Tripura (out of 8).

title: Top Places to visit in Almora, Uttarakhand
content: Almora is a district in the Kumaon division of Uttarakhand state, India. The headquarters is at Almora. It is 1,638 meters above sea level. The neighbouring regions are Pithoragarh district to the east, Garhwal region to the west, Bageshwar district to the north and Nainital district to the south

title: Top Places to visit in Bageshwar, Uttarakhand
Top Places to visit in Chamoli, Gopeshwar, Uttarakhand
content: Chamoli district is the second largest district of Uttarakhand state of India. It is bounded by the Tibet region to the north, and by the Uttarakhand districts of Pithoragarh and Bageshwar to the east, Almora to the south, Pauri Garhwal to the southwest, Rudraprayag to the west, and Uttarkashi to

title: Top Places to visit in Champawat, Uttarakhand
content: Champawat district is a district of Uttarakhand state in northern India. The town of Champawat is the administrative headquarters. The district of Champawat constituted in the year 1997. The district is divided into five tehsils: Barakot, Champawat, Lohaghat, Pati, Purnagiri.

title: Top Places to visit in Dehradun, Uttarakhand
content: Dehradun district is a district of Uttarakhand state in northern India. The district headquarters is Dehradun, which has also served as the interim capital of Uttarakhand since its founding in 2000. title: Top Places to visit in Haridwar, Uttarakhand
content: Haridwar district also spelled as Hardwar is a district in the state of Uttarakhand, India. It is headquartered at Haridwar which is also its largest city. The district is ringed by the districts Dehradun in the north and east, Pauri Garhwal in the east and the Uttar Pradesh districts of Muzaffar

title: Top Places to visit in Nainital, Uttarakhand
content:
Nainital district is a district of Uttarakhand state, India. The headquarters is at Nainital.
